column5: Had some guys last year get together for a "man club" night to swap some stories, pictures,and a beer or two. Nice time, got to meet some new compadraes and talk fish. We are going to but up there the week of the 18th (June)this year and plan on the same swarray, if anybody else would be interested in getting together. I would be glad to host, we are about 5 miles east of Sioux Lookout. C you on the water.
